Holistic Health Care Services

I work with Alternative, Holistic Healthcare Options according to each individual’s specific needs. Holistic Health Care options include Dietary Support & Guidance, Vitamins, Mineral Cell Salts, and a Holistic approach to lifestyle change.

 

Home Away From Home

Airy and Welcoming Office environment that reduces stress and promotes healthy living.

Cutting Edge Technology

I use technology that is among the most advanced in the Holistic Health Care Industry (Including but not limited to Laser Treatment Therapy as well as Nutritional and Emotional Support programs that addresses topics ranging from stress, PTSD, and depression)

Passionate & Approachable

I provide a Sound and “motherly” aspect of consultation, meaning I am easy to talk to and very approachable. View my Resume.

**I DO NOT ACCEPT HEALTH CARE INSURANCE, INCLUDING MEDICARE**

VISA, CHECKS, & CASH ARE ALWAYS WELCOME!

Invigorated, Energized & Balanced

That's what my clients tell they feel after experiencing the  “Insight 2 Your Wellness Program”. The program promotes a healthy lifestyle with specific measures and plans in place to adapt to each and every unique patient. The program has a goal of balancing your Holistic Health Scale in order to enable the patient to spend more time with family and living a fulfilling life.

My simple 10 steps to rebalancing.

 

  1. Two hour consultation that includes a physical and an overall emotional health assessment
  2. Identifying the highest distressed organ the body and determining a plan of action
  3. Detoxify the body by focusing on activating the lymphatic system and supporting it through homeopathic products
  4. Supporting the rest of the body with homeopathic and laser treatments
  5. Revolutionary detoxing sessions with revitalizing benefits
  6. Follow up visits that will include Laser Treatment and Assessment (30 Minute Sessions)
  7. Determining whether continued Laser Treatment is necessary before creation of Personal Wellness Plan
  8. Ensure proper Holistic Health Care Practices are followed through development of a Personal Wellness Plan
  9. Follow up with the Personal Wellness Plan to stay on track (30 Minute Sessions)
  10. Enjoy a Healthy Life!
